attributes.action: Remove the Broadband monopoly in Hull so as to enable the residents of Hull to be freed from the slavery of Kingston Communications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Please remove your reference to "slavery" and the commercial products that you refer to. 

If you could ammend these references we would be happy to carry this petition.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
